select.if: select * from ( select rownum rn ,tt.*from( select * from sale_board join jajumember using(member_id) order by sale_date desc)tt) where rn >= ${startNum} and rn <= ${endNum}

select * from ( select rownum rn ,tt.*from( select * from sale_board join jajumember using(member_id) where sale_category like #{sale_category} order by sale_date desc)tt) where rn >= ${startNum} and rn <= ${endNum}
select count(*) as count from sale_board join jajumember using(member_id)
select count(*) as count from sale_board join jajumember using(member_id) where sale_category = #{sale_category}

select * from ( select rownum rn ,tt.*from( select * from sale_board join jajumember using(member_id) where ${searchOption} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by sale_date desc)tt) where rn >= ${startNum} and rn <= ${endNum}

select * from ( select rownum rn ,tt.*from( select * from sale_board join jajumember using(member_id) where sale_category like #{sale_category} and ${searchOption} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by sale_date desc)tt) where rn >= ${startNum} and rn <= ${endNum}
select count(*) as count from sale_board join jajumember using(member_id) where ${searchOption} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
select count(*) as count from sale_board join jajumember using(member_id) where sale_category = #{sale_category} and ${searchOption} like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
